mapper.select: select id, openid, nickname, sex, province, city, country, headimgurl from protect_animal.weixin_user where openid=#{openid}
mapper.insert: insert into protect_animal.weixin_user(openid, nickname, sex, province, city, country, headimgurl) values (#{openid},#{nickname},#{sex},#{province},#{city},#{country},#{headimgurl})
